Description: You pace back and forth, putting together the information you know about the Elder Wand. You know it´s said to have been created by Death itself, as a gift for a man defying his destined death. You know its made with elderwood and has a core of thestral tail hairs. The key to repairing it must be...

Options.Name: ...to find the materials its made from, and use alchemy to repair it

Description: You need to find elderwood and thestral tail hairs. Then you need to find a talented enough alchemist to repair it.

Options.Name: Acquire elderwood

Description: You know eldertrees are very rare, and because of their magical properties, well hidden. Perhaps it would be easier finding an object made out of elderwood instead.

Options.Name: Look for an eldertree
Look for an object

Description: If anyone knows where to find an eldertree, it´s the people protecting them.

Options.Name: Go to the Ministry of Magic

Description: You go through the entrance, and step up to the reception-desk. The receptionist asks you what your business with the Ministry is about, and how he can help.

Options.Name: Tell him that you are a reporter, covering rare trees and protected wildlife.

Description: He pauses for a second, then asks what he should do with that information.

Options.Name: Tell him you want to talk to someone that knows a lot about eldertrees.

Description: He types something into an old computer. After a few seonds, he mumbles about 'these damn muggle-objects'. He tells you to just go to floor five and ask around, because those wildlife specialists are never busy anyways.

Options.Name: Go to floor five.

Description: You walk through the corridors on floor five, until you fínd the Department of Wildlife Research and Protection. You read the name-tags outside of the offices. You decide to knock on...

Options.Name: ...Mr Blooms office
...Mrs Ordvalds office

Description: The door opens and a man with a big, orange beard greets you with a smile. He tells you to come in and sits down by his desk. He asks you how he can help you.

Options.Name: Tell him you are writing an article about eldertrees, and need to know more about them

Description: He scoffs and tells you that you came to the right man. He asks you what you want to know.

Options.Name: Ask him where to find any eldertrees
Start with an unsuspecting question

Description: He fidgets for a while, then tells you that he can´t say.

Options.Name: Go for his ego
Bribe him

Description: You sigh, and tell him you heard he was the best, but you suppose that was wrong. You suggest that maybe Mrs Ordival could answer your questions instead. Mr Bloom laughs mockingly. He says that she can´t even differentiate a phoenix-feather from a duck-feather, and that unlike him, she is not knowledgeble.

Options.Name: Ask him to prove his knowledge

Description: He shrugs and mumbles about what damage it could do, the proceeds to show you a map of a nearby area. He says the trees are cloaked to look like ordinary oak-trees, but they are in fact eldertrees in disguise. You know the area, a few miles outside Hogwarts.

Options.Name: Thank Mr Bloom and go to tha eldertree area

Description: You go through the area, filled with oak-trees. You remeber the map Mr Bloom showed you, and you go toward the middle of the area, where the eldertrees should be.

Options.Name: Cast revelio

Description: Something changes in the corner of your eye. One of the tress changes shape and hue. You go up to it, and you recognice it right away, elderwood. You grab a branch and break it off of the tree. Now theres only two more steps.
You decide it´s more likely to find an object made from elderwood. You immediately think an old friend that collects all kinds of magical objects and materials.

Options.Name: Go to visit them

Description: You wait until the weekend, and you take the train to the village where your friend lives; Ottery St. Catchpole. You walk through the village, to an open field a few minutes away. Suddenly you see a familiar house, and a familiar person sitting outside on the porch. They stand up and greet you, with a surprised and excited look.

Options.Name: Greet them back

Description: Terra Lovegood smiles wide, and asks you what you´re doing here.

Options.Name: Tell her about the Elder Wand
Tell her you need the material for your class

Description: She nods and smiles through your whole story, and at the end, you´re convinced she doesn´t believe you. She laughs and disappears into the house.

Options.Name: Wait for her to come back

Description: She returns with a wooden box in her hands, and she holds it out for you to take. You grab the box and notice the wood it´s made out of; elderwood. Now theres only two more steps.
She nods through your explanation, and at the end, you´re convinced she doesn´t believe your lie. She laughs and disappears into the house.

Options.Name: Wait for her to come back

Description: She returns with a wooden box in her hands, and she holds it out for you to take. You grab the box and notice the wood it´s made out of; elderwood. Now theres only two more steps.
